review: So I did my research on the Amazon Fire TV Stick and bought it because it was affordable and I'm getting rid of my COX TV in the next month or two.One thing I didn't count on or even notice was the length of the USB Cable (60 inches).  I plugged the Fire Stick into the TV and tried to plug it into the power strip and it wouldn't reach.Nowhere on the description does it mention how long the USB Cable is.  Also, when you buy the Amazon Fire TV Stick it doesn't give you the option to buy a longer cord.Make sure your TV and power cord are within 60 inches of each other or else you won't be watching Amazon TV.
